item.title: Pandas
item.description:
Description

I"pandas is used by many people to make their lives easier when analyzing data. This talk is centered around how the overarching goal of user productivity has driven the balance of API development and performance optimization. We will cover some pandas basics. We'll talk about pandas performance. And we'll discuss data structures and algorithms. Along the way, we'll cover best practices and tools useful for developing open source projects."
item.dc:creator: Chang She

item.title: Serverless billion-scale vector search for AI applications
item.description:
Description

[EuroPython 2023 â€” North Hall on 2023-07-19]

https://ep2023.europython.eu/session/serverless-billion-scale-vector-search-for-ai-applications

From recommendation systems to LLM-based applications, vector search is a critical component of the modern AI workflow. Existing vector solutions are complicated to use, hard to maintain, and cost too much. LanceDB is a free open-source vector store that can perform low latency vector search on billion-scale vector datasets on a single node.

item.dc:creator: Chang She
